mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM tf_f_cust_group g,tf_f_user u, tf_f_user_member m WHERE g.CUST_ID=m.VPN_ID AND m.MEMBER_ROLE_NUMBER=u.SERIAL_NUMBER AND g.CUST_ID= #{custId}
mapper.insert: insert into tf_f_cust_group (partition_id, CUST_ID, GROUP_ID, CUST_NAME, GROUP_TYPE, CLASS_ID, CUST_CLASS_TYPE, GROUP_ATTR, GROUP_STATUS, GROUP_ADDR, PROVINCE_CODE, EPARCHY_CODE, CITY_CODE, SUPER_GROUP_ID, PNATIONAL_GROUP_ID, MP_GROUP_CUST_CODE, UNIFY_PAY_CODE, CUST_MANAGER_ID, ASSIGN_DATE, ASSIGN_STAFF_ID, WEBSITE, FAX_NBR, EMAIL, POST_CODE, GROUP_MGR_SN, GROUP_MGR_CUST_NAME, CUST_SERV_NBR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_STAFF_ID, UPDATE_DEPART_ID, REMARK, CUST_MANAGER_ID_B, RSRV_TAG1, RSRV_STR2, PNATIONAL_GROUP_NAME, GROUP_CONTACT_PHONE, RSRV_STR7) values (#{partitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custClassType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupAttr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eparchyCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{superGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pnationalGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpGroupCustCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifyPayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assignStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupMgrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupMgrCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custServNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerIdB,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rsrvTag1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rsrvStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pnationalGroupName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{groupContactPhone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{rsrvStr7,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into tf_f_cust_group (partition_id, CUST_ID, GROUP_ID, CUST_NAME, GROUP_TYPE, CLASS_ID, CUST_CLASS_TYPE, GROUP_ATTR, GROUP_STATUS, GROUP_ADDR, PROVINCE_CODE, EPARCHY_CODE, CITY_CODE, SUPER_GROUP_ID, PNATIONAL_GROUP_ID, MP_GROUP_CUST_CODE, UNIFY_PAY_CODE, CUST_MANAGER_ID, ASSIGN_DATE, ASSIGN_STAFF_ID, WEBSITE, FAX_NBR, EMAIL, POST_CODE, GROUP_MGR_SN, GROUP_MGR_CUST_NAME, CUST_SERV_NBR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_STAFF_ID, UPDATE_DEPART_ID, REMARK, CUST_MANAGER_ID_B, RSRV_TAG1, RSRV_STR2 ) values (#{partitionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custClassType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupAttr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eparchyCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{superGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pnationalGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mpGroupCustCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifyPayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assignStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupMgrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupMgrCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custServNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManagerIdB,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rsrvTag1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rsrvStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
